label: Organization & Formatting
description: Data placed in correct folder, read in, and variables have been renamed for ease of use in analysis.

label: Organization & Formatting
description: Data not placed in correct folder OR variables were not renamed.

label: Organization & Formatting
description: Data not placed in correct folder AND variables were not renamed, or not properly read into R.

label: Data Summary
description: Measures of centrality and variability in appropriate variables are computed; at leaset two new useful measures are computed.

label: Data Summary
description: Measures of centrality and variability in appropriate variables are computed; only one new useful measure computed.

label: Data Summary
description: Measures of centrality and variability missing; failed to compute new measures.

label: Data Visualization 1
description: Charts expertly demonstrates best practices of visual design and highlights leadership in installed capacity.

label: Data Visualization 1
description: Charts generally demonstrates best practices of visual design and highlights leadership in installed capacity; some elements might be confusing.

label: Data Visualization 1
description: Chart generally lacks best practices of visual design; elements are confusing, does not highlight leadership in capacity.

label: Data Visualization 2
description: Charts expertly demonstrates best practices of visual design and conveys a clear message.

label: Data Visualization 2
description: Charts generally demonstrates best practices of visual design and conveys a reasonably clear message; some elements might be confusing.

label: Data Visualization 2
description: Chart generally lacks best practices of visual design; elements are confusing, does not highlight a clear message.

label: Analysis Description
description: Informative description of flaws in the original chart & their improvements; clear description of revised chart key message.

label: Analysis Description
description: Description of one or two of design flaws in original chart & improvements made; accurate but incomplete description of key message in revised charts.

label: Analysis Description
description: Poor description of design flaws in the original chart & improvements made; poor or missing description of key message of revised charts

label: Technical things
description: All code runs without errors; all files included in the submitted .zip file.

label: Technical things
description: Code has only one or two error, otherwise runs; all files included in the submitted .zip file.

label: Technical things
description: Code has multiple errors; submitted .zip file is missing components necessary to reproduce analysis.
